abstract: Yazid Mansouri (Arabic: يزيد منصوري‎, Yazīd Manṣūrī) (born 25 February 1978 in Revin, Ardennes, France) is a retired Algerian footballer who played as a defensive midfielder. Mansouri announced his retirement from international football on 26 June 2010, after mentioning to the media that he will not be participating in the friendly in August against Gabon and the 2012 African Cup of Nations qualifiers.
